segment.source: I am done - ending a Surface Hub meeting
segment.target: I am done - ending a Surface Hub meeting

segment.source: To end a Surface Hub meeting, tap I am Done.
segment.target: To end a Surface Hub meeting, tap I am Done.

segment.source: Surface Hub cleans up the application state, operating system state, and the user interface so that Surface Hub is ready for the next meeting.
segment.target: Surface Hub cleans up the application state, operating system state, and the user interface so that Surface Hub is ready for the next meeting.

segment.source: End a Surface Hub meeting with I'm Done
segment.target: End a Surface Hub meeting with I'm Done

segment.source: Surface Hub is a collaboration device designed to be used simultaneously and sequentially by multiple people.
segment.target: Surface Hub is a collaboration device designed to be used simultaneously and sequentially by multiple people.

segment.source: At the end of a Surface Hub meeting, one of the attendees can tap or click I'm Done to end the meeting.
segment.target: At the end of a Surface Hub meeting, one of the attendees can tap or click I'm Done to end the meeting.

segment.source: Tapping I'm Done tells Surface Hub to clean up info from the current meeting, so that it will be ready for the next meeting.
segment.target: Tapping I'm Done tells Surface Hub to clean up info from the current meeting, so that it will be ready for the next meeting.

segment.source: When a meeting attendee taps I'm Done, Surface Hub cleans up, or resets, these states.
segment.target: When a meeting attendee taps I'm Done, Surface Hub cleans up, or resets, these states.

segment.source: Applications
segment.target: Applications

segment.source: Operating system
segment.target: Operating system

segment.source: User interface
segment.target: User interface

segment.source: This topic explains what I'm Done resets for each of these states.
segment.target: This topic explains what I'm Done resets for each of these states.

segment.source: Applications
segment.target: Applications

segment.source: When you start apps on Surface Hub, they are stored in memory and data is stored at the application level.
segment.target: When you start apps on Surface Hub, they are stored in memory and data is stored at the application level.

segment.source: Data is available to all users during that session (or meeting) until date is removed or overwritten.
segment.target: Data is available to all users during that session (or meeting) until date is removed or overwritten.

segment.source: When I'm done is selected, Surface Hub application state is cleared out by closing applications, deleting browser history, resetting applications, and removing Skype logs.
segment.target: When I'm done is selected, Surface Hub application state is cleared out by closing applications, deleting browser history, resetting applications, and removing Skype logs.

segment.source: Close applications
segment.target: Close applications

segment.source: Surface Hub closes all visible windows, including Win32 and Universal Windows Platform (UWP) applications.
segment.target: Surface Hub closes all visible windows, including Win32 and Universal Windows Platform (UWP) applications.

segment.source: The application close stage uses the multitasking view to query the visible windows.
segment.target: The application close stage uses the multitasking view to query the visible windows.

segment.source: Win32 windows that do not close within a certain timeframe are closed using TerminateProcess.
segment.target: Win32 windows that do not close within a certain timeframe are closed using TerminateProcess.

segment.source: Delete browser history
segment.target: Delete browser history

segment.source: Surface Hub uses Delete Browser History (DBH) in Edge to clear Edge history and cached data.
segment.target: Surface Hub uses Delete Browser History (DBH) in Edge to clear Edge history and cached data.

segment.source: This is similar to how a user can clear out their browser history manually, but I'm Done also ensures that application states are cleared and data is removed before the next session, or meeting, starts.
segment.target: This is similar to how a user can clear out their browser history manually, but I'm Done also ensures that application states are cleared and data is removed before the next session, or meeting, starts.

segment.source: Reset applications
segment.target: Reset applications

segment.source: I'm Done resets the state of each application that is installed on the Surface Hub.
segment.target: I'm Done resets the state of each application that is installed on the Surface Hub.

segment.source: Resetting an application clears all background tasks, application data, notifications, and user consent dialogs.
segment.target: Resetting an application clears all background tasks, application data, notifications, and user consent dialogs.

segment.source: Applications are returned to their first-run state for the next people that use Surface Hub.
segment.target: Applications are returned to their first-run state for the next people that use Surface Hub.

segment.source: Remove Skype logs
segment.target: Remove Skype logs

segment.source: Skype does not store personally-identifiable information on Surface Hub.
segment.target: Skype does not store personally-identifiable information on Surface Hub.

segment.source: Information is stored in the Skype service to meet existing Skype for Business guidance.
segment.target: Information is stored in the Skype service to meet existing Skype for Business guidance.

segment.source: Local Skype logging information is the only data removed when I'm Done is selected.
segment.target: Local Skype logging information is the only data removed when I'm Done is selected.

segment.source: This includes Unified Communications Client Platform (UCCP) logs and media logs.
segment.target: This includes Unified Communications Client Platform (UCCP) logs and media logs.

segment.source: Operating System
segment.target: Operating System

segment.source: The operating system hosts a variety of information about the state of the sessions that needs to be cleared after each Surface Hub meeting.
segment.target: The operating system hosts a variety of information about the state of the sessions that needs to be cleared after each Surface Hub meeting.

segment.source: File System
segment.target: File System

segment.source: Meeting attendees have access to a limited set of directories on the Surface Hub.
segment.target: Meeting attendees have access to a limited set of directories on the Surface Hub.

segment.source: When I'm Done is selected, Surface Hub clears these directories:
segment.target: When I'm Done is selected, Surface Hub clears these directories:

segment.source: Music
segment.target: Music

segment.source: Videos
segment.target: Videos

segment.source: Documents
segment.target: Documents

segment.source: Pictures
segment.target: Pictures

segment.source: Downloads
segment.target: Downloads

segment.source: Surface Hub also clears these directories, since many applications often write to them:
segment.target: Surface Hub also clears these directories, since many applications often write to them:

segment.source: Desktop
segment.target: Desktop

segment.source: Favorites
segment.target: Favorites

segment.source: Recent
segment.target: Recent

segment.source: Public Documents
segment.target: Public Documents

segment.source: Public Music
segment.target: Public Music

segment.source: Public Videos
segment.target: Public Videos

segment.source: Public Downloads
segment.target: Public Downloads

segment.source: Credentials
segment.target: Credentials

segment.source: User credentials that are stored in TokenBroker, PasswordVault, or Credential Manager are cleared when you tap I’m done.
segment.target: User credentials that are stored in TokenBroker, PasswordVault, or Credential Manager are cleared when you tap I’m done.

segment.source: User interface
segment.target: User interface

segment.source: User interface (UI) settings are returned to their default values when I'm Done is selected.
segment.target: User interface (UI) settings are returned to their default values when I'm Done is selected.

segment.source: UI items
segment.target: UI items

segment.source: Reset Quick Actions to default state
segment.target: Reset Quick Actions to default state

segment.source: Clear Toast notifications
segment.target: Clear Toast notifications

segment.source: Reset volume levels
segment.target: Reset volume levels

segment.source: Reset Cortana relaunch count
segment.target: Reset Cortana relaunch count

segment.source: Reset sidebar width
segment.target: Reset sidebar width

segment.source: Reset tablet mode layout
segment.target: Reset tablet mode layout

segment.source: Accessibility
segment.target: Accessibility

segment.source: Accessibility features and apps are returned to default settings when I'm Done is selected.
segment.target: Accessibility features and apps are returned to default settings when I'm Done is selected.

segment.source: Filter keys
segment.target: Filter keys

segment.source: High contrast
segment.target: High contrast

segment.source: Stickey keys
segment.target: Stickey keys

segment.source: Toggle keys
segment.target: Toggle keys

segment.source: Mouse keys
segment.target: Mouse keys

segment.source: Magnifier
segment.target: Magnifier

segment.source: Narrator
segment.target: Narrator

segment.source: Clipboard
segment.target: Clipboard

segment.source: The clipboard is cleared to remove data that was copied to the clipboard during the session.
segment.target: The clipboard is cleared to remove data that was copied to the clipboard during the session.

segment.source: Frequently asked questions
segment.target: Frequently asked questions

segment.source: What happens if I forget to tap I'm Done at the end of a meeting, and someone else uses the Surface Hub later?
segment.target: What happens if I forget to tap I'm Done at the end of a meeting, and someone else uses the Surface Hub later?

segment.source: When you don't tap I"m Done at the end of your meeting, Surface Hub enters a Resume state.
segment.target: When you don't tap I"m Done at the end of your meeting, Surface Hub enters a Resume state.

segment.source: This is similar to leaving content on a whiteboard in a meeting room, and forgetting to erase the whiteboard.
segment.target: This is similar to leaving content on a whiteboard in a meeting room, and forgetting to erase the whiteboard.

segment.source: When you return to the meeting room, that content will still be on the whiteboard unless someone erarses it.
segment.target: When you return to the meeting room, that content will still be on the whiteboard unless someone erarses it.

segment.source: With Surface Hub, meeting content is still available if an attendee doesn't tap I'm Done.
segment.target: With Surface Hub, meeting content is still available if an attendee doesn't tap I'm Done.

segment.source: However, Surface Hub removes all meeting data during daily maintenance.
segment.target: However, Surface Hub removes all meeting data during daily maintenance.

segment.source: Any meeting that wasn't ended with I'm Done will be cleaned up during maintenance.
segment.target: Any meeting that wasn't ended with I'm Done will be cleaned up during maintenance.

segment.source: Are documents recoverable?
segment.target: Are documents recoverable?

segment.source: Removing files from the hard drive when I'm Done is selected is just like any other file deletion from a hard disk drive.
segment.target: Removing files from the hard drive when I'm Done is selected is just like any other file deletion from a hard disk drive.

segment.source: 3rd-party software might be able to recover data from the hard disk drive, but file recovery is not a supported feature on Surface Hub.
segment.target: 3rd-party software might be able to recover data from the hard disk drive, but file recovery is not a supported feature on Surface Hub.

segment.source: Do the clean-up actions from I'm Done comply with the US Department of Defense clearing and sanitizing standard: DoD 5220.22-M?
segment.target: Do the clean-up actions from I'm Done comply with the US Department of Defense clearing and sanitizing standard: DoD 5220.22-M?

segment.source: No.
segment.target: No.

segment.source: Currently, the clean-up actions from I'm Done do not comply with this standard.
segment.target: Currently, the clean-up actions from I'm Done do not comply with this standard.
